entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:04 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:13 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near Zeballos and Tahsis. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Wet snow inland. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning except 60 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
